item.title: core update
item.description:
core update by RDG :
Use locationmap for resource resolution. Exposes internal stylesheets as {lm:simplifiedDocbook.transform.*.*}

item.title: code add (bug FOR-449)
item.description:
code add by DB (fixes bug FOR-449)
:
Better handling of link text. Thanks to Aaron Isotton.

item.title: code add
item.description:
code add by RDG :
Created the initial plugin by copying map snippets and samples from Forrest Core.

item.title: code fix (bug FOR-317)
item.description:
code fix by JJP (fixes bug FOR-317)
:
docbook2document.xsl: remove unnecessary / from template matches. Thanks to Sean Wheller.

item.title: code fix (bug FOR-316)
item.description:
code fix by JJP (fixes bug FOR-316)
:
docbook2document.xsl: docinfo element. never in OASIS Docbook XML DTD Thanks to Sean Wheller.

item.title: code fix (bug FOR-308)
item.description:
code fix by DC (fixes bug FOR-308)
:
docbook2document.xsl: handle the xref and xreflabel. Thanks to Sean Wheller.

item.title: core update

core update by RDG :
Use locationmap for resource resolution. Exposes internal stylesheets as {lm:simplifiedDocbook.transform.*.*}
